departureFlight.from: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

returnFlight.to: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

localTransport.details: Arrange for a pre-booked taxi from the airport to your accommodation. Consider renting scooters for local travel for getting around.

activities.title: Arrival in Goa & Transfer to Arpora
activities.description: Arrive at Dabolim Airport (GOI). Meet your pre-booked taxi and transfer to Resort Rio in Arpora, North Goa. Check in and freshen up.

activities.title: Lunch at Souza Lobo
activities.description: Head to Calangute and have lunch at the iconic Souza Lobo known for its Goan cuisine and seafood.

sustainableAlternative.title: Lunch at Local Thali Place
sustainableAlternative.description: Eat at a local thali place, food prepared with locally sourced ingredients. Reduces environmental impact.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local farmers; reduces food miles

activities.title: Relax at Baga Beach
activities.description: Spend the late afternoon relaxing at Baga Beach. You can opt for water sports or simply enjoy the sunset.

activities.title: Dinner at Britto's
activities.description: Have dinner at Britto's, another famous restaurant on Baga Beach, known for its seafood and lively atmosphere.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at a eco-friendly Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at an eco-friendly restaurant that follows sustainable practices like waste management and local sourcing.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces environmental impact with sustainable practices.

activities.title: Visit Fort Aguada
activities.description: Visit Fort Aguada, a well-preserved 17th-century Portuguese fort offering panoramic views of the Arabian Sea.

activities.title: Explore Chapora Fort
activities.description: Explore Chapora Fort, famous for its scenic views and its appearance in the movie 'Dil Chahta Hai'.

activities.title: Lunch at Curlies
activities.description: Have lunch at Curlies, a popular beach shack on Anjuna Beach, known for its seafood and relaxed vibe.

sustainableAlternative.title: Lunch at Local Goan Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at local restaurant that utilizes locally sourced ingredients reducing transportation overhead and environmental pollution.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports Goan Farmers and reduces food mileage.

activities.title: Anjuna Flea Market (Wednesday Special - Consider Alternatives)
activities.description: Explore the vibrant Anjuna Flea Market if your visit coincides with a Wednesday. (If not Wednesday, skip to next activity).

sustainableAlternative.title: Visit the Saturday Night Market (If Saturday)
sustainableAlternative.description: Explore the Saturday Night Market (if Saturday) supports local artisans.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local artisans and reduces mass-produced goods.

activities.title: Sunset at Vagator Beach
activities.description: Enjoy the sunset at Vagator Beach, known for its cliffs and scenic beauty.

activities.title: Dinner at Antares
activities.description: Have dinner at Antares, a stylish restaurant with ocean views.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at family-owned restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant that utilizes locally sourced ingredients reducing transportation overhead and environmental pollution.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Support local communities and reduce the dependence on international foods.

activities.title: Visit Dudhsagar Falls (Consider Eco-Friendly Tour)
activities.description: Take a day trip to Dudhsagar Falls, one of India's tallest waterfalls. Consider booking an eco-friendly tour.

sustainableAlternative.title: Guided Nature Hike
sustainableAlternative.description: Take a guided hike through the surrounding forest to minimize impact on the falls.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Helps to protect the delicate ecosystem around the waterfalls.

activities.title: Lunch near Dudhsagar Falls
activities.description: Have lunch at a local restaurant near Dudhsagar Falls.

sustainableAlternative.title: Pack your own lunch
sustainableAlternative.description: Instead of buying lunch at local restaurants, carry your own lunch to reduce wastage.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste and support local businesses.

activities.title: Return to Arpora
activities.description: Return to your accommodation in Arpora.

activities.title: Dinner at The Fisherman's Wharf
activities.description: Have dinner at The Fisherman's Wharf, known for its seafood and ambiance.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at eco-conscious restaurants
sustainableAlternative.description: Select a restaurant that supports local fisheries and minimizes environmental impact.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Promotes responsible fishing and reduces environmental impact.

activities.title: Visit Reis Magos Fort
activities.description: Explore Reis Magos Fort, a historical fort recently restored.

activities.title: Explore Panjim
activities.description: Visit Panjim, the capital city of Goa. Explore the Latin Quarter (Fontainhas).

sustainableAlternative.title: Walking Tour
sustainableAlternative.description: Opt for a walking tour of Panjim

activities.title: Lunch at Viva Panjim
activities.description: Enjoy lunch at Viva Panjim, known for authentic Goan cuisine.

sustainableAlternative.title: Lunch at a Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Enjoy lunch at restaurant that is supporting local farming.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Support local economy and reduces the cost of food and transporation.

activities.title: Mandovi River Cruise (Consider Sustainable Options)
activities.description: Take a Mandovi River cruise. Look for operators that prioritize sustainable tourism.

sustainableAlternative.title: Kayaking
sustainableAlternative.description: Opt for kayaking in the Mandovi River.

activities.title: Dinner at Mum's Kitchen
activities.description: Enjoy dinner at Mum's Kitchen, famous for Goan dishes.

sustainableAlternative.title: Family-owned Restaurants
sustainableAlternative.description: Select restaurants that sources its products from local farming businesses.

activities.title: Relaxing Morning
activities.description: Enjoy a relaxing morning at your resort. You can use the pool or spa facilities.

sustainableAlternative.title: Eco-walk at Resort
sustainableAlternative.description: Particapte in eco-walk organized by Resort, where one can learn about environment.

activities.title: Check out from Resort Rio
activities.description: Check out from Resort Rio.

activities.title: Lunch at Martin's Corner
activities.description: Enjoy a final Goan lunch at Martin's Corner, known for seafood.

sustainableAlternative.title: Lunch at Small Eateries
sustainableAlternative.description: Lunch at Small Eateries which serves food with locally grown products.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Support local economy and reduces the cost of food and transporation.

activities.title: Transfer to Dabolim Airport
activities.description: Transfer to Dabolim Airport for your flight back to Mumbai.
